sentence.Network_en: The crowd gathered in Islamabad to support Pakistan suspended chief justice.

sentence.Network_en: He had spearheaded an increasingly violent vigilante campaign against vice in Islamabad.

sentence.Network_en: The blast was the second targeting foreigners in Islamabad.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是在伊斯兰堡第二次针对外国人的攻击.
